title: 86x8: Honorarium and Outside Compensation for Government Work
summary:
An agency’s supply service personnel should not accept compensation for their participation in a corporation’s market research survey, as such compensation violates 18 U.S.C. § 209 and 5 C.F.R. §§ 735.201a(a), 735.203, and 735.206 restrictions. 

Notes: [cites former 5 C.F.R. part 735]
